frontend.title: House Price Comparison
frontend.subtitle: A jQuery App
frontend.description: A website that allows users to search house prices in the US (Zillow gives free API on house price data not found in Thailand).

frontend.title: Decision Dice - frontend (SPA)
frontend.subtitle: A jQuery/NodeJS App - frontend part
frontend.description: Helps users automate trivial decisions e.g. which food to eat or what to do in the evening. Users can put their options in a 'dice' to roll and let chance decide for them
frontend.note: Loading app maybe slow as this is hosted in the US. It was created while I was in New York.

frontend.title: Readable App
frontend.subtitle: A React/Redux App
frontend.description: A simulation of a forum website.
frontend.demo: Please clone and put up local dev environment

frontend.title: Portfolio
frontend.subtitle: A React App
frontend.description: It shows the source code for this website itself. I experimented with recursion in JsonComponent and learned a lot making this.

backend.title: Decision Dice - backend (API)
backend.subtitle: A jQuery/NodeJS App - backend part
backend.description: Helps users automate trivial decisions like which food to eat or what to do in the evening. Users can put most common options in a 'dice' to roll and let chance decide for them
backend.note: Loading app maybe slow as this is hosted in the US.

backend.title: Flash Card Website
backend.subtitle: A React/Redux + NodeJS App
backend.description: A flash card application where user can perform CRUD on flashcards, and quiz themselves.

mobile.title: Flash Card Native
mobile.subtitle: A React Native App
mobile.description: Users can create decks of flashcards. They can quiz by the deck and receive score feedback. The design is not mine, but I wrote the code
mobile.demo: Please clone and put up local dev environment

design.title: Suan Bua Hotel - Logo and Identity Example
design.subtitle: Brand Identity for a small hotel & resort in the north of Thailand
design.description: Commissioned for Logo, but worked out brand identity so client can see potential of the design.

design.title: NOAM - graphic collection
design.subtitle: A jewelry website aimed for 20-30 years old
design.description: A collection of images and screenshots from a jewelry website that I designed. Nothing adventourous, designed for the less computer savvy in mind.

design.title: A collage of different works
design.subtitle: A collection of digital design works for quick perusal
design.description: Most of these are small projects, freelance works, and hobby works combined into a collage.
